title: Galactic Civilization (2003)
description:
Games : Windows : Full Game : English
Game information: Release Date: 03/17/03
=================

Galactic Civilizations is a space-based strategy game in which the player becomes the leader of the human civilization at the dawn of the 23rd century. The galaxy has 6 major civilizations including humans and a race is on to colonize, conquer, and dominate the galaxy using whatever means necessary. Those means include using military, technological, economic or political might to become a major power in the galaxy. Players must research new technologies, colonize and defend planets, build social improvements, build a fleet, fight wars, win elections, and gain influence in the United Planets Security council. The game is won when either all the races become united in a galactic alliance, someone researches technology that takes them beyond mortality, or conquers all opposition with their military might.

Installation Information:
=========================
Just mount or burn the .cue file with your favorite CD-Recording software. Then install the game and enjoy ! 

When asked for CDKEY enter: DN-500792-GC1-CLS4FLT8XT
